recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs, cheese, pepper. 4. Combine all.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-fry
recipes.instructions: 1. Slice chicken and veggies. 2. Stir-fry chicken. 3. Add veggies and sauce.

recipes.name: Keto Salmon with Asparagus
recipes.instructions: 1. Season salmon and asparagus. 2. Bake at 200C for 15 mins.
